channel.title: Run.bat client error
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: src/Loader Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: src.Loader at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Loader. Program will exit.
Loader file is located in src run.bat code
@echo off @title Azyrom "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\java.exe" - Dfile.encoding=Cp1252 -classpath bin;lib/libs.jar;lib/graphics.jar; Loader pause

item.title: Run.bat client error
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
